short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the green & blue colour scheme of Smarkets to the blue & pink colour scheme seen in Betfair and Matchbook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avoid confusion when switching between betting exchanges!
This add-on changes the green & blue colour scheme of Smarkets, seen on the buy & sell buttons, and other UI elements, to the more conventional blue & pink colour scheme seen in Betfair and Matchbook.
Enjoy consistent colours across all your exchanges for ultimate familiarity and peace of mind.

This add-on only changes the colours of UI elements, not their position or function. Some green elements are unaffected and remain green, as green is the primary brand colour of Smarkets. These elements are universal, and do not indicate the side of a trade, such as the confirm trade button, or the multiples switch.
